title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Ham?
description: An ambitious young reporter with the looks and brains to become a star, new hire Ringo Laurenge is poised for a great future with the 'Washington Examiner'. Too bad most of the staffers - including Chas Wheatley - wish the arrogant, back-stabbing creep would get his just desserts. Not only does this egomaniac steal other reporters's stories, he's also determined to destroy a restaurant Chas is researching. Her worries over Ringo have even begun to cut into Chas's love life. It's only a matter of time before the cheesy writer headlines the obituary page. But the insatiably curious Chas - a journalist with a taste for sleuthing and scoops - isn't sure she wants to find out which of her colleagues, and the rest of the capital, finally had enough ...
author: Phyllis C. Richman
